short.ar: معاينة الارتباط مع دعم التداخل وترجمة الصفحة. تقليل عدد علامات التبويب المفتوحة.
short.am: ቅድመ እይታን ከጎጆ ድጋፍ እና ከገጽ ትርጉም ጋር ያገናኙ። የተከፈቱ ትሮችን ብዛት ይቀንሱ።
short.bg: Визуализация на връзката с поддръжка за влагане и превод на страница. Намалете броя на отворените раздели.
short.bn: নেস্টিং সমর্থন এবং পৃষ্ঠা অনুবাদ সহ লিঙ্ক প্রিভিউ। খোলা ট্যাবের সংখ্যা কমিয়ে দিন।
short.ca: Vista prèvia d'enllaços amb suport d'imbricació i traducció de pàgines. Redueix el nombre de pestanyes obertes.
short.cs: Náhled odkazu s podporou vnořování a překladem stránky. Snižte počet otevřených karet.
short.da: Forhåndsvisning af link med understøttelse af indlejring og sideoversættelse. Reducer antallet af åbne faner.
short.de: Linkvorschau mit Verschachtelungsunterstützung und Seitenübersetzung. Reduzieren Sie die Anzahl der geöffneten Tabs.
short.el: Προεπισκόπηση συνδέσμου με υποστήριξη ένθεσης και μετάφραση σελίδας. Μειώστε τον αριθμό των ανοιχτών καρτελών.
short.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US: Link preview with nesting support and page translation. Reduce the number of open tabs.
short.es,es_419: Vista previa de enlaces con soporte de anidamiento y traducción de páginas. Reducir el número de pestañas abiertas.
short.et: Lingi eelvaade pesastustoe ja lehe tõlkega. Vähendage avatud vahekaartide arvu.
short.fa: پیش نمایش پیوند با پشتیبانی تودرتو و ترجمه صفحه. تعداد برگه های باز را کاهش دهید.
short.fi: Linkin esikatselu sisäkkäistukeen ja sivun käännökseen. Vähennä avoimien välilehtien määrää.
short.fil: Preview ng link na may suporta sa nesting at pagsasalin ng page. Bawasan ang bilang ng mga bukas na tab.
short.fr: Aperçu du lien avec prise en charge de l'imbrication et traduction des pages. Réduisez le nombre d’onglets ouverts.
short.gu: નેસ્ટિંગ સપોર્ટ અને પૃષ્ઠ અનુવાદ સાથે લિંક પૂર્વાવલોકન. ખુલ્લી ટેબની સંખ્યા ઘટાડવી.
short.he: תצוגה מקדימה של קישור עם תמיכת קינון ותרגום עמודים. צמצם את מספר הכרטיסיות הפתוחות.
short.hi: पूर्वावलोकन को नेस्टिंग समर्थन और पृष्ठ अनुवाद के साथ लिंक करें। खुले टैब की संख्या कम करें.
short.hr: Pregled veze s podrškom za ugniježđivanje i prijevod stranice. Smanjite broj otvorenih kartica.
short.hu: Linkelőnézet beágyazási támogatással és oldalfordítással. Csökkentse a megnyitott lapok számát.
short.id: Pratinjau tautan dengan dukungan bersarang dan terjemahan halaman. Kurangi jumlah tab yang terbuka.
short.it: Anteprima dei collegamenti con supporto per l'annidamento e traduzione delle pagine. Ridurre il numero di schede aperte.
short.ja: ネストのサポートとページ翻訳を備えたリンクのプレビュー。開いているタブの数を減らします。
short.kn: ಗೂಡುಕಟ್ಟುವ ಬೆಂಬಲ ಮತ್ತು ಪುಟ ಅನುವಾದದೊಂದಿಗೆ ಲಿಂಕ್ ಪೂರ್ವವೀಕ್ಷಣೆ. ತೆರೆದ ಟ್ಯಾಬ್‌ಗಳ ಸಂಖ್ಯೆಯನ್ನು ಕಡಿಮೆ ಮಾಡಿ.
short.ko: 중첩 지원 및 페이지 번역이 포함된 링크 미리보기. 열려 있는 탭 수를 줄이세요.
short.lt: Nuorodos peržiūra su įdėjimo palaikymu ir puslapio vertimu. Sumažinkite atidarytų skirtukų skaičių.
short.lv: Saites priekšskatījums ar ligzdošanas atbalstu un lapas tulkošanu. Samaziniet atvērto ciļņu skaitu.
short.ml: നെസ്റ്റിംഗ് പിന്തുണയും പേജ് വിവർത്തനവും ഉള്ള ലിങ്ക് പ്രിവ്യൂ. തുറന്ന ടാബുകളുടെ എണ്ണം കുറയ്ക്കുക.
short.mr: नेस्टिंग समर्थन आणि पृष्ठ भाषांतरासह लिंक पूर्वावलोकन. खुल्या टॅबची संख्या कमी करा.
short.ms: Pratonton pautan dengan sokongan bersarang dan terjemahan halaman. Kurangkan bilangan tab terbuka.
short.nl: Linkvoorbeeld met nestondersteuning en paginavertaling. Verminder het aantal geopende tabbladen.
short.no: Forhåndsvisning av koblinger med neststøtte og sideoversettelse. Reduser antall åpne faner.
short.pl: Podgląd łącza z obsługą zagnieżdżania i tłumaczeniem stron. Zmniejsz liczbę otwartych kart.
short.pt_BR,pt_PT: Visualização de links com suporte para aninhamento e tradução de páginas. Reduza o número de guias abertas.
short.ro: Previzualizare link cu suport pentru imbricare și traducere a paginii. Reduceți numărul de file deschise.
short.ru: Предварительный просмотр ссылок с поддержкой вложенности и переводом страниц. Уменьшите количество открытых вкладок.
short.sk: Ukážka odkazu s podporou vnorenia a prekladu stránky. Znížte počet otvorených kariet.
short.sl: Predogled povezave s podporo za gnezdenje in prevod strani. Zmanjšajte število odprtih zavihkov.
short.sr: Преглед везе са подршком за гнежђење и преводом странице. Смањите број отворених картица.
short.sv: Länkförhandsgranskning med kapslingsstöd och sidöversättning. Minska antalet öppna flikar.
short.sw: Unganisha onyesho la kukagua na usaidizi wa kuweka kiota na tafsiri ya ukurasa. Punguza idadi ya vichupo vilivyofunguliwa.
short.ta: நெஸ்டிங் ஆதரவு மற்றும் பக்க மொழிபெயர்ப்புடன் இணைப்பு மாதிரிக்காட்சி. திறந்த தாவல்களின் எண்ணிக்கையைக் குறைக்கவும்.
short.te: గూడు మద్దతు మరియు పేజీ అనువాదంతో లింక్ ప్రివ్యూ. తెరిచిన ట్యాబ్‌ల సంఖ్యను తగ్గించండి.
short.th: ดูตัวอย่างลิงก์พร้อมการสนับสนุนการซ้อนและการแปลหน้า ลดจำนวนแท็บที่เปิดอยู่
short.tr: Yuvalama desteği ve sayfa çevirisi ile bağlantı önizlemesi. Açık sekmelerin sayısını azaltın.
short.uk: Попередній перегляд посилань із підтримкою вкладеності та перекладом сторінок. Зменште кількість відкритих вкладок.
short.vi: Xem trước liên kết với hỗ trợ lồng nhau và dịch trang. Giảm số lượng tab đang mở.
short.zh_CN: 链接预览与嵌套支持和页面翻译。减少打开的选项卡数量。
short.zh_TW: 連結預覽與嵌套支援和頁面翻譯。減少打開的選項卡數量。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e:
How to open a preview:
        • Open link preview - hover over the link and press Ctrl + MouseWheel click, or Alt+Click, or press long click, or drag the link. You can also open it via the context menu.
        • Open an blank (new) preview window - anywhere on the page except the link, press Ctrl + 2x MouseWheel, or Alt + 2x Click, or open it via the context menu. 



Benefits:

1. Ability to open nested previews from already open ones. Unlike other extensions, you don't have to open the page from preview in a new tab to preview links from there. Also, a nested preview opens not inside the parent one, but on top of it, which means it is not limited by its size.

2. Translation of previewed pages

3. Convenient resize and move the preview window, and also the page zoom inside it. Zoom in on the page you're viewing as usual by pressing Ctrl and scrolling the mouse wheel.

4. Support for entering in the address bar: enter the address of the site you want to go to, or a search query. By default, the search query will be sent to Google, but you can choose another search engine or add your own.

5. Open cross-domain links without disabling clickjacking protection. Let's say you have a Google site open in a tab, and you want to open a Yahoo site in the preview. In many preview extensions you won't be able to do this due to browser limitations. In others you can, but only because they disable protection and put you at risk. But in Advanced Link Preview you can open such links without disabling protection, which means you will be safe.


Attention: after installing the extension, before trying to test it, reload the page on which you will do it.
long.en:
How to open a preview:
        • Open link preview - hover over the link and press Ctrl + MouseWheel click, or Alt+Click, or press long click, or drag the link. You can also open it via the context menu.
        • Open an blank (new) preview window - anywhere on the page except the link, press Ctrl + 2x MouseWheel, or Alt + 2x Click, or open it via the context menu. 

Benefits:

1. Ability to open nested previews from already open ones. Unlike other extensions, you don't have to open the page from preview in a new tab to preview links from there. Also, a nested preview opens not inside the parent one, but on top of it, which means it is not limited by its size.

2. Translation of previewed pages

3. Convenient resize and move the preview window, and also the page zoom inside it. Zoom in on the page you're viewing as usual by pressing Ctrl and scrolling the mouse wheel.

4. Support for entering in the address bar: enter the address of the site you want to go to, or a search query. By default, the search query will be sent to Google, but you can choose another search engine or add your own.

5. Open cross-domain links without disabling clickjacking protection. Let's say you have a Google site open in a tab, and you want to open a Yahoo site in the preview. In many preview extensions you won't be able to do this due to browser limitations. In others you can, but only because they disable protection and put you at risk. But in Advanced Link Preview you can open such links without disabling protection, which means you will be safe.


Attention: after installing the extension, before trying to test it, reload the page on which you will do it.
